text: "Best Song Ever" is a 2013 song by English-Irish boy band One Direction and is the lead single from their third studio album Midnight Memories. It went to number 2 in Canada, Denmark, Ireland, the United Kingdom and the United States, number 3 in Italy and New Zealand, number 4 in Australia and Hungary, number 5 in the Netherlands, number 8 in Greece and South Africa, number 9 in Spain and number 11 in South Korea and Switzerland. Category:2013 songs Category:One Direction songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Best Song Ever
